ygData.subject: Re: Underwater areas
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard the portal in the Everfrost caves is to the plain of Hate.  The Water Plain entrance I have heard is in Lake Rathe, I think. Rokenn Swiftsong -
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard the portal in the Everfrost caves is to the plain of Hate. The
Water Plain entrance I have heard is in Lake Rathe, I think.

Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server
Master Brewer of Societus Argenti
Amerginn - Test server

>From: "Roop Dirump" <roop@...>
>
>Well, remember the place. Did you find the area with another structure
>guards by two ice bones? If you enter it, you will be teleported back out.
>Seems likely to me this is a portal to the (unfinished) dimension of water,
>good thing you will already have Ayre memorized.
>
>Roop
>
>
>
>
> >From: "Symber Ash" <symber1@...>
> >
> >I've checked out that cave as well...There is a strange symbol on the
>wall
> >that repeats itself in many rooms...I found an alter, with 2 ice bone
>
